The ai killed me. Thank you for uploading this i like a challenge.

The long awaited AI V.6.0 is out!
--------------------------------------------------------
Changelog:

    - Custom state manager
    - New resource managing functions (total saturation per town)
    - Expansion managing functions (defences, etc)
    - New custom AI attack functions (resource harrasing, constant pressure on the player)
    - 3 new opens, mid and late games for every race. (Which means 27 different variations per race and 81 overall)
    - All the crappy old build orders are gone.
--------------------------------------------------------
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5415202/Starcraft_2_Beta_-_AI_V.6.0.%28Easy__Medium__Hard%29.%5BDarkBlizz%5D

Good to hear it mreekers ;D

try v.6, it pwns.

it actually counters things like mass mutalisks with templar aoe's etc.

pretty pro.

Yes v6 is much better than 5.5. It killed me the first time but after that I killed it every time. It is still pretty hard I like it a lot yet I am using the standard one right now. I will try the cheating AI once I come up with perfect strategy.

Glad to hear it mreekers ;D
It's always nice to hear when someone is happy and I was able to make them so.

Cheers bro.
Hey Frice I found the perfect strategy and I killed the cheating AI v6 Terran, Zerg, and Protoss 4 times in a row with Protoss.
Nice to hear it bro, you try the 5 player map w/ that strat yet? Lemme know if you do.
Yes I did and I died on the 5 player map. My "perfect strategy" doesn't work with multiple enemies. Only with one enemy.

: / thats to bad mreekers, you should try more of a turtle as it is FFA and they will kill each other off eventually if you do not become a threat to them that is... 

;D

This is Lame, i cant wait till sc2 comes out.., i've tried this ai(v5.5) and v6 but how can u people lose?, they cant break ur defense and they just linger in front your base until they get finished off, while killing each other! is there no melee? so i can be attacked from all directions?
i must be really bad, i cant beat these (cheating) AI's! where the cheat codes at??

Thank you, Frice. I look forward to competing against this AI! I have won every single match against AI so far - even "Hard Non-Cheating" AI.... they had a bad script though. Thanks for your hard work!
